mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.status, o.create_time, o.pay_time, o.amount, o.check_in, o.check_out, o.nights, o.guests, o.contact_name, o.contact_phone, o.special_requests, h.id as "house.id", h.name as "house.name", COALESCE(hi.url, h.image) as "house.image", h.address as "house.address" FROM t_user_order o LEFT JOIN t_house h ON o.house_id = h.id LEFT JOIN t_house_image hi ON h.id = hi.house_id AND hi.is_cover = 1 AND hi.deleted = 0 WHERE o.id = #{orderId} AND o.deleted = 0
